chinese: n.指示器
english: indicator

chinese: 这个软件显示了这台笔记本电脑的网速。
english: This software provides an indicator of the laptop's Internet speed

chinese: 。花费，费用
english: expense

chinese: 买车是笔大花销。
english: Buying a car can be a great expense

chinese: 区围攻；困扰
english: besiege

chinese: 警察已经包围了这栋楼。
english: The police have besieged the building

chinese: V将变形，改变，转换
english: transform

chinese: 丑陋的小虫变成了美丽的蝴蝶。
english: The ugly worm transformed into a beautiful butterfly

chinese: adi.操作的，运转的
english: operational

chinese: 尽管屏幕坏了，我的手机还是可以正常使用。
english: The screen of my phone is broken, but it is still operational

chinese: v.嘲笑；轻蔑，蔑视！adil 不真诚的；伪造的 n. 模拟考试
english: mock

chinese: 那条大狗在地上爬着走，嘲笑柯基的短腿。
english: The big dog crawled on its belly, mocking the Corgi's short legs

chinese: 1.部署
english: deployment

chinese: 这只狗下令派遣了100名狗士兵帮助小猫们与猴子作战。
english: The dog ordered the deployment of 100 troops to help the cats fight monkeys

chinese: adj.始终如一的，一致的
english: consistent

chinese: 过去三年中，他的身高始终保持不变。
english: His height has remained consistent over the past three years

chinese: V.动员起来；动员；鼓动起
english: mobilize

chinese: 我们老师动员我们要为考试更努力地学习！
english: Our teacher mobilized us to study harder for the exam

chinese: ad）.严酷的；严重的；严厉的；剧烈的
english: severe

chinese: 在如此严酷的天气下，人们行走得很艰难。
english: It's hard for people to walk in such severe weather conditions

chinese: n. 合金V.使成合金
english: alloy

chinese: 我们用高强度的合金来制造发动机的叶片。
english: We used a strong alloy for the blades of the engine

chinese: n.调解
english: mediation

chinese: 他的调解无疑帮他们解决了争端。
english: His mediation definitely helped to resolve their dispute

chinese: .再洗牌，改组，重新安排 D.。 重新洗
english: reshuffle

chinese: 发牌人重新洗牌以确保没有失误。
english: The dealer reshuffled the cards to make sure there was no mistake

chinese: n.例子
english: instance

chinese: 地震在一些情况下是毁灭性的，但在另一些情况下则影响较小。
english: Earthquakes, in some instances, can be devastating, whereas in others they might be quite mild

chinese: ad）.纵向的
english: longitudinal

chinese: 跟他的T恤不同，他的裤子上有纵向条纹。
english: His trousers have longitudinal stripes, unlike his T-shirt
